title: Google Docs is reorganizing and shrinking toolbar menus on the web
content:
Google is updating the toolbar menus that appear in the Docs web client with a focus on making it “easier to locate the most commonly used features.” 

more…

The post Google Docs is reorganizing and shrinking toolbar menus on the web appeared first on 9to5Google.
